testimonials.quote: Marcus absolutely smashed my sleeve piece. The detail work is incredible and it's healed perfectly. Already planning my next one!
testimonials.author: Jake P.

testimonials.quote: Been going to Redwood for years now, they never disappoint. Clean studio, friendly atmosphere, and the work speaks for itself.
testimonials.author: Amy L.

paragraphs: Redwood started as a small shop with big dreams in the heart of Manchester's creative quarter. What began as a single chair operation has grown into one of the city's most trusted studios, but we've never lost that neighbourhood feel that makes this place special.

Marcus and the team believe tattooing is about more than just putting ink to skin—it's about creating something that becomes part of your story. Every piece that walks out of here carries a bit of Redwood's soul with it, and that's exactly how we like it.
about.callout: Located right in the beating heart of the Northern Quarter, we're part of Manchester's creative DNA
about.imageAlt: Marcus working on a detailed tattoo piece at Redwood studio

items.question: Do you take walk-ins?
items.answer: Yeah, we do our best to fit in walk-ins, especially for smaller pieces. Peak times like weekends can get busy though, so calling ahead is always a good shout.

items.question: What's your deposit policy?
items.answer: We ask for £50 deposit to secure your booking, which comes off your final bill. If you need to reschedule, just give us 24 hours notice and we'll move it no problem.

items.question: How do I book a consultation?
items.answer: Either pop in during opening hours or drop us a message on Instagram. For bigger custom pieces, we like to have a proper chat about what you're after before we start drawing anything up.

finalCta.headline: Ready to get started?
finalCta.subheadline: Book your session at Redwood and join the hundreds of satisfied clients who trust us with their ink

booking.modalDescription: Tell us about your tattoo idea and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to arrange your appointment.
booking.successMessage: Thanks for choosing Redwood. We'll be in touch within 24 hours to confirm your session details.
booking.depositDisclaimer: £50 deposit required to secure booking, deducted from final price
